casebody.data:
CAPP
v.
NW SIGN INDUSTRIES et al. No. 383A05-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 10, 2008. David P. Ferrell, Raleigh, for NW Sign Industries, et al. Richard B. Fennell, Charlotte, for Alan Capps.

Prior report: 171 N.C.App. 409, 614 S.E.2d 552.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 652 S.E.2d 372.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of December 2007 by Plaintiff to Dismiss Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of April 2008."
